title: Hilakku (region)
description: Hilakku is a mountainous region near Tabālu and Que in the Cilician plain. Its exact location is still debated among scholars. Nevertheless, Hilakku has been tentatively identified as being in the area of Bolkar Dağları or in that of Göksu-Tal, in the western part of Cilicia, that is, in the classical Cilicia Tracheia/Cilicia Aspera.

properties.description: A proposed location of Hilakku based on the Helsinki Atlas. Representative Point is based on the coordinates for the Place Resource Cilicia Tracheia (Barrington Atlas: BAtlas 66 C4 Cilicia Tracheia).
properties.title: Representative location of Hilakku 2 (Cilicia Tracheia)

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap node for Bolkar Dağları. A proposed location of Hilakku based on Bagg, RGTC 7/1.
properties.title: Representative location of Hilakku 1 (Bolkar Dağları)
